lead_paragraph: Maxim Afinogenov had a goal and two assists to help the Buffalo Sabres remain unbeaten and set a franchise record with their 12th consecutive victory, 5-4 over Carolina.
snippet: Maxim Afinogenov had a goal and two assists to help the Buffalo Sabres remain unbeaten and set a franchise record with their 12th consecutive victory, 5-4 over Carolina.
